phase.description: Right pane file tree via git2-rs (Tauri commands: get_file_tree, get_git_status, get_file_content, get_diff). Changed files highlighted in tree (modified=yellow, added=green, deleted=red indicators). CodeMirror 6 viewer: read-only (EditorState.readOnly.of(true) + EditorView.editable.of(false)), dynamic language switching via Compartment. Diff view for changed files. Git status display (branch, ahead/behind). Theme CodeMirror to match dark palette via CSS variables. IMPORTANT: open new Repository instance per Tauri command handler (git2-rs !Send/!Sync). Call view.destroy() on unmount. Set explicit height + overflow on CodeMirror.
